import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings( 'ignore' )

sns.set(style='darkgrid')
plt.rcParams["figure.figsize"] = (20,8)

for col in df.columns[1:5]:
  sns.lineplot(x='year', y=col, data=df)
  plt.ylabel('total')
  plt.legend(df.columns[1:5])
  plt.title('DATA ABOUT MILITARY', size=18)
  plt.ticklabel_format(style='plain', axis='y')

source.960fddef:
for col in df.columns[10:len(df)]:
  sns.lineplot(x='year', y=col, data=df)
  plt.ylabel('total')
  plt.legend(df.columns[10:len(df)])
  plt.title('MILITARY DEATHS BY CAUSE 1980-2010', size=18)
